name: 50 years of Gaming
description:
50 of Gaming is a homage to video games, starting in 1971 with Pong and going to Celeste in 2018, the game traces the path and evolution of games over 50 years.

The game selection is based on their decades of release:

Pong - 1970

Super Mario Bros - 1980

Super Metroid - 1990

Limbo - 2000*

Celestial - 2010

This game is a entry to Jam for All, 2021. The competition took place within a 48 hours .

The Game Jam theme was "50", which can be interpreted as we wanted, we chose to honor the 50 years of game development.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thierry - Producer, VFX, Composer, Game Designer

Gustavo - Creature Designer, Composer

Juliano - Character Designer, Artist

Gabriel - Programmer, Level Designer

Luany - Environment Artist

Leonardo - Artist, Sound Designer

Miguel - Artist

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer:

 Due to the size of the scope of the game, Limbo was left out.
